name: Catabox
description:
Controls:

Catapult Controls:

  • WASD/Arrows to control strength and angle of fling
  • Space to launch the cat

In Air Controls:

  • Space to deploy parachute
  • AD/Left-Right to influence direction while parachute is deployed

Misc:

'R' to reset at any time

Background Assets - Unity asset store 
SFX - Zapslat.com

This was my first game jam so I would love to hear feedback.  

Made for Weekly Game Jam # 172 (Catapult).
